arrR: Individual-Based Simulation Model of Artifical Reefs in R

Source: R/arrR-package.R
arrR.Rd

Individual-based simulation model to analyze how artificial reefs in combination with a fish population influence seagrass growth.

For more information about how to use the model, please see https://allgeier-lab.github.io/arrR/.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://allgeier-lab.github.io/arrR/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/Allgeier-Lab/arrR/issues
